message.body: What time are we going up?
My movies done in a half hour...
Ok. Nain said dinner at 5:30. Steve and I can get the fried rice, can you and tyler order and pick up the chicken at happy joes? Nain wants 6 light and 6 dark pieces.
Can you bring the pedialyte that's in the fridge? If there's not a lot then we may need more but two half bottles are good
If it is two half bottles and bottles of water
And diet pepsi caffeine free please we don't have that so you'll have to buy it please
